definition: Inner Mongolia University

sentences.english: Coal mine flooding accident occurred in Inner Mongolia Wuhai.
sentences.chinese: 內蒙古烏海發生煤礦透水事故。

sentences.english: China, Inner Mongolia, Wuhai City suburbs.
sentences.chinese: 中國，內蒙古，烏海市郊區。

sentences.english: Leymus chinensis and Stipa grandis are dominant species with a wide distribution in the Inner Mongolian steppes.
sentences.chinese: 羊草和大針茅是內蒙古典型草原地帶性分佈的優勢種。

sentences.english: Maoqinggou cemetery was located in Liangcheng County, Inner Mongolia, dated back to the Eastern Zhou Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 毛慶溝墓地是內蒙古涼城縣東周時期的墓地。

sentences.english: Ian Teh has donated this photograph taken in Inner Mongolia from the series Traces.
sentences.chinese: 鄭永仁從內蒙古痕跡系列捐贈一張照片作是次拍賣。

sentences.english: The Laodonggou gold deposit in the Erjinaqi, Inner Mongolia is an oxidizing-Leaching type gold deposit.
sentences.chinese: 內蒙古額濟納旗老硐溝礦牀爲氧化淋濾型金礦牀。

sentences.english: "The table mountain" is located in wuhai city inner mongolia china.
sentences.chinese: 桌子山位於內蒙古烏海市境內。

sentences.english: The northern part of Liaoning Province lies to the south of Kerqin Desert of Inner Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 遼寧北部處於內蒙古科爾沁沙地“百里翰海”的南緣。

sentences.english: China travel, Inner Mongolia, Horqin, Xianghai wetland, drought. Photo by KaKa.
sentences.chinese: 中國旅遊，內蒙古，科爾沁，向海溼地，乾旱。

sentences.english: Mongols live in Mongolia autonomous region. They like wrestling.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古族人居住在內蒙古自治區，喜歡摔跤。

sentences.english: The south Dongsuqi is located in the geosynclinal fold system of Middle Inner Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 東蘇旗南部處於內蒙古中部地槽褶皺系。

sentences.english: Classification and distribution of the genus Betula L.
sentences.chinese: 內蒙古樺木屬植物的分類與分佈。

sentences.english: The cold air masses are moving from Siberia towards Inner Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 冷空氣正由西伯利亞向內蒙古移動。

sentences.english: The Mongolian script is used by Mongolian nationality that live in Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 內蒙古是一個以蒙古族爲主體的少數民族自治地區。

sentences.english: It is mainy produced in Changhua, Zhejiang Province, and Balin, Inner Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 主產地爲浙江昌化和內蒙古巴林。

sentences.english: The research is to clarify the sibship and geographic distribution of Artemisia frigida Populations.
sentences.chinese: 闡明內蒙古冷蒿居羣親緣關係與地理分佈的關係。

definition: Inner Mongolia or Inner Mongolia autonomous region 內蒙古自治區|内蒙古自治区[Nei4 meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]
Heilongjiang province (Heilungkiang) in northeast China, abbr. 黑, capital Harbin 哈尔滨/Heilongjiang river forming the border between northeast China and Russia/Amur river
Gansu province, abbr. 甘[Gan1], short name 隴|陇[Long3], capital Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1]
Shaanxi (formerly Shensi), province in northwest China, abbr. 陝|陕[Shan3], capital Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4]
Gansu Province, abbr. 甘[Gan1], short name 隴|陇[Long3], capital Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1]
abbr. for Shaanxi 陝西|陕西 province
Liaoning province in northeast China, short name 遼|辽[Liao2], capital Shenyang 瀋陽|沈阳[Shen3 yang2]
Guizhou province (Kweichow) in south central China, abbr. to 黔[Qian2] or 貴|贵[Gui4], capital Guiyang 貴陽|贵阳[Gui4 yang2]
Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region, abbr. 寧|宁[Ning2], capital Yinchuan 銀川|银川[Yin2 chuan1]
Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区 in South Central China, on the border with Vietnam, abbr. 桂, capital Nanning 南寧|南宁/until 1959, Guangxi province

Ürümqi or Urumqi prefecture level city and capital of Xinjiang Uighur autonomous region 新疆維吾爾自治區|新疆维吾尔自治区 in west China
Guangdong province (Kwangtung) in south China, short name 粵|粤[Yue4], capital Guangzhou 廣州|广州
